Key Match Events: Naseem Shah's successive sixes led to frenzied celebrations in the Pakistan camp and a tearful exit for his opponents
Naseem despatched both full tosses over long-off to seal the game with four balls to spare
Fareed Ahmad sent back Haris Rauf and the dangerous Asif Ali
Naseem sent back Mohammad Nabi for a first-ball duck
Najibullah Zadran deposited Shadab over deep midwicket for a six
Najibullah charged at the ball, picked it up with his right hand, turned around and nailed a direct hit at the bowler's end to find Fakhar short of his ground
Rashid Khan trapped Mohammad Rizwan lbw with a googly
Shadab hit Nabi for a six and a four, and followed it with another six off Mujeeb
Asif slog-swept the following ball for another six
Farooqi brought back Afghanistan in the game by dismissing Nawaz and Khushdil Shah in the 18th over
Post-Match Reflections: The result not only brought down the curtain on Afghanistan's campaign but also on defending champions India's.
The Pakistan fast bowlers kept Rashid Khan and Azmatullah Omarzai largely quiet with clever use of the slower ball.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Four late wickets gave Afghanistan a chance, before Fazalhaq Farooqi's full tosses went for sixes, and eliminated both Afghanistan and India
Naseem Shah's hits led to frenzied celebrations in the Pakistan camp, and a tearful exit for his opponents
Pakistan won a seesawing, low-scoring thriller to beat Afghanistan by one wicket in Sharjah, thus booking their date with Sri Lanka in the final of the 2022 Asia Cup.
The result ended the hopes of Afghanistan and India in the tournament.
Afghanistan were eliminated from the tournament, and India were knocked out as well.
The match was a low-scoring thriller, with Pakistan needing 21 runs from 2 overs, and then Naseem Shah's successive sixes sealed the game for Pakistan.
Pakistan's spinners Shadab and Mohammad Nawaz put a brake on the scoring rate in the middle overs.
Najibullah Zadran's direct hit to dismiss Fakhar Zaman was a crucial moment in the match.
The match was a seesawing contest, with both teams having their chances to win.
The result was a huge upset for Afghanistan, and a great victory for Pakistan.
